alert.note: Alert for Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:42PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Weakley and eastern Obion Counties through 415 PM CST... At 342 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Fulton to Kenton. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Union City, Fulton, Dresden, South Fulton, Kenton, Sharon, Latham, Palmersville, Rives, Mount Pelia, Ruthville, Ralston, Shaffner, Brundige, Terrell, Pisgah, Matheny Grove, Ore Springs and Sidonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
